message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making an offer of $18000. Can you consider this?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $18000 is still a bit low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $19000?  This would be a fair price for both of us. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $17500. Can you consider this?

Hi Bob, I understand you're working within a budget, but $17500 is just a little too low for me.  To make this work, I'm willing to come down to $18000.  This would be a final offer from my side.  Let me know if you're able to accept this.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $16500. Can you consider this?
